fixes.name: Deposit amount
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level calculated field IF [TransactionType] = "Deposit" THEN [Amount] END into a Power BI calculated column using IF(..., value, BLANK()) with table-qualified column references.

fixes.name: Withdrawal Amount
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level calculated field IF [TransactionType] = "Withdrawal" THEN [Amount] END into a Power BI calculated column using IF(..., value, BLANK()) with table-qualified column references.

fixes.name: Net Flow
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau aggregation SUM([Deposit amount]) - SUM([Withdrawal Amount]) to DAX using SUM over the corresponding table-qualified calculated columns.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
